pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: He flew on El Al a few months before he flew on US airline.
sentences.chinese: 他乘坐美国航空公司的几个月前他飞以色列艾拉。

sentences.english: It's No. 302 on the third floor.
sentences.chinese: 这是美国航空公司302次班机。

sentences.english: US Airways offers last-minute international fares on Friday morning, Banas says.
sentences.chinese: 美国航空公司在周五早上提供“最后一分钟”机票。

sentences.english: The plane holds 144 passengers, according to the US Airways website.
sentences.chinese: 据美国航空公司网站信息，该机承载144名旅客。

definition: Delta Air Lines, Inc., airline headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia
